attributes.action: ensure that any decision on the public funding of political parties is put to the people in a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my view that the vested interest structure of political parties is contrary to a democratic environment whereby elected representatives are elected to represent the people of their constituency rather than the political party machine that they are affiliated with.  If people wish to fund this then they would subscribe to political parties, it is my view that the right to divert or effectively steal funds from the public should be decided by the public, not a nameless cross party committee.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
